title: Counting Stars
content: Let's count the stars together! 1, 2, 3, 4, 5... Can you count with me? Stars are bright and beautiful in the night sky.
subject: math

title: The Water Cycle
content: Let me tell you about how rain is made! The sun heats up water from lakes and rivers. It goes up to the sky as clouds, then comes back down as rain to water the plants.
subject: science

title: Rainbow Colors
content: Red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet! These are the colors of the rainbow. Can you name all the colors?
subject: art

title: Farm Animals
content: On the farm we can see many animals! Cows say 'moo', pigs say 'oink', chickens say 'cluck', and sheep say 'baa'. What sound does your favorite animal make?
subject: science
